Alexandra Grant, Rebut Hati Keanu Reeves Setelah 20 Tahun
06 Nov 2019, 02:40 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alexandra Grant dan Keanu Reeves terus menggenggam tangan masing-masing. (Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for LACMA/AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktor Keanu Reeves tampak kembali membuka hati setelah melajang selama 20 tahun. Belum lama ini, ia tampak percaya diri menggandeng sang kekasih baru, Alexandra Grant ke hadapan publik untuk pertama kali.Pasangan tersebut terlihat menghadiri acara LACMA Art + Film Gala di Los Angeles dan berpose bersama di karpet merah. Bintang The Matrix yang tampil dalam setelan jas serba hitam pun seolah tak mau kehilangan sang kekasih selama berjalan dan berpose di depan kamera. Ia enggan melepas genggaman tangannya dari Grant yang tampil anggun dengan gaun warna biru.Menurut Metro, Grant merupakan seorang seniman yang berspesialisasi di seni patung dan lukisan. Sepanjang berkarier di bidang seni, wanita berusia 46 tahun itu menggelar pameran tunggal pertamanya di Museum of Contemporary Art (MOCA), Los Angeles pada 2007 dan dikuratori oleh Alma Ruiz.Selain itu, Grant juga sempat menjajal di bidang perfilman sebagai sutradara pada 2015. Sebagai bagian dari residensi di Bemis Center for Contemporary Art di Omaha, Nebraska, Grant menyutradarai film dokumenter berjudul Taking Lena Home. Film ini bercerita tentang mengembalikan batu nisan curian ke pedesaan Nebraska.Sama seperti Reeves, Grant pun senang berkutat di bidang sosial. Ia menjadi pendiri dalam proyek filantropi bertajuk grantLOVE. Lewat proyek itu, Grant memproduksi dan menjual karya seni asli dan terbatas dengan keuntungan untuk proyek seniman dan seni nirlaba. Proyek grantLOVE juga mendukung organisasi seni yang beragam seperti Heart of Los Angeles (Seni Visual) di Los Angeles dan Union for Contemporary Art di Omaha, Nebraska.Sementara, pertemuan pertama Grant dengan Reeves diduga kala mereka berkolaborasi lewat buku 'Ode To Happiness' pada 2011. Sang aktor berusia 55 tahun itu menulis puisi, sedangkan Grant memberi sentuhan lewat seni visual.Pada 2016, keduanya bersatu kembali untuk kolaborasi berikutnya, 'Shadows', sebuah buku dan rangkaian gambar foto yang dicetak oleh Gerhard Steidl di Jerman. Foto-foto dalam buku itu juga dipamerkan di Galeri ACME di Los Angeles, dan Galeri Ochi di Sun Valley, Idaho.Setahun setelahnya, Grant dan Reeves mendirikan sebuah perusahaan penerbitan buku kecil bernama X Artists 'Books, yang terkadang disingkat XAB.


Setelah mengalami tragedi beruntun pada tahun 2000-an, Keanu Reeves tak pernah membuka kehidupan pribadinya sampai ia menggandeng Alexandra Grant, sang pacar baru. (Foto: AFP PHOTO / Frederic J. Brown)

Sementara, kedekatan keduanya dilaporkan telah terjadi dalam beberapa bulan terakhir, tetapi baru lewat acara LACMA keduanya tampil di depan publik untuk pertama kali.Di sisi lain, penampilan ini juga yang pertama bagi Reeves bersama sang pacar dalam beberapa tahun terakhir, mengingat bintang Bill & Ted terkenal kerap merahasiakan kehidupan pribadinya.Selama beberapa waktu Reeves sempat dikaitkan memiliki hubungan asmara dengan bintang-bintang seperti Sandra Bullock, Claire Forlani dan Amanda de Cadenet, tapi tidak pernah dikonfirmasi secara resmi.Sebelumnya, Reeves menjalin hubungan dengan Jennifer Syme di akhir 90-an, dan pada 1999, mereka mengalami tragedi ketika sang putri Ava meninggal dunia di usia delapan bulan. Hubungan Reeves dan Syme tak pernah membaik, hingga memutuskan berpisah pada 2000. Setahun kemudian, pada 2 April 2001, Syme meninggal di usia 28 tahun setelah menabrakkan mobilnya ke deretan mobil yang diparkir saat menuju pesta yang diadakan oleh Marilyn Manson. (agn/rea)
text:
Alexandra Grant, Seize the Heart of Keanu Reeves After 20 Years
Nov 6 2019, 02:40 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alexandra Grant and Keanu Reeves continued to hold each other's hands. (Emma McIntyre / Getty Images for LACMA / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actor Keanu Reeves looks back to open his heart after being single for 20 years. Not long ago, he seemed confident holding his new lover, Alexandra Grant to the public for the first time. The couple was seen attending the LACMA Art + Film Gala event in Los Angeles and posing together on the red carpet. The Matrix star who appeared in a black suit seemed to not want to lose her lover while walking and posing in front of the camera. He was reluctant to remove his hand from Grant who appeared elegant in a blue dress. According to Metro, Grant is an artist who specializes in sculpture and painting. During her career in the arts, the 46-year-old woman held her first solo exhibition at the Museum of Contemporary Art (MOCA), Los Angeles in 2007 and was curated by Alma Ruiz. In addition, Grant also had time to try out in the film industry as a director in 2015. As As part of a residency at Bemis Center for Contemporary Art in Omaha, Nebraska, Grant directed a documentary titled Taking Lena Home. This film tells the story of returning a stolen tombstone to rural Nebraska. Just like Reeves, Grant was happy to dwell on the social field. He is the founder of a philanthropy project called grantLOVE. Through the project, Grant produces and sells original and limited works of art with profits for the artist and nonprofit arts project. The grantLOVE project also supports diverse arts organizations such as the Heart of Los Angeles (Visual Arts) in Los Angeles and Union for Contemporary Art in Omaha, Nebraska. Meanwhile, Grant's first meeting with Reeves was allegedly when they collaborated through the book 'Ode To Happiness' in 2011 The 55-year-old actor wrote poetry, while Grant gave a touch through visual art. In 2016, the two reunited for the next collaboration, 'Shadows', a book and a series of photographic images printed by Gerhard Steidl in Germany. The photos in the book were also exhibited at the ACME Gallery in Los Angeles, and the Ochi Gallery in Sun Valley, Idaho.A year after that, Grant and Reeves founded a small book publishing company called X Artists' Books, which is sometimes abbreviated as XAB.


After experiencing successive tragedies in the 2000s, Keanu Reeves never opened his personal life until he took Alexandra Grant, his new girlfriend. (Photo: AFP PHOTO / Frederic J. Brown)

Meanwhile, the closeness of the two is reported to have occurred in recent months, but only through the LACMA event both appeared in public for the first time. On the other hand, this appearance is also the first for Reeves with his girlfriend in recent years, given the stars Bill & Ted famously often kept his private life secret. For some time Reeves had been linked to having an affair with stars like Sandra Bullock, Claire Forlani and Amanda de Cadenet, but it was never officially confirmed. Previously, Reeves had a relationship with Jennifer Syme in the late 90s , and in 1999, they experienced tragedy when the daughter of Ava died at the age of eight months. Reeves and Syme's relationship never improved, until he decided to split in 2000. A year later, on April 2, 2001, Syme died at the age of 28 years after crashing his car into a row of cars parked on the way to a party hosted by Marilyn Manson. (agn / rea)
